metadata.name: Serenity by Eva Cortez
metadata.description:
She belongs to the collection "100 days, 100 drawings with my fingers".

Each day I drew a character that represents a vibe, an emotion, a virtue, an attitude that we should have before life (or maybe we shouldn't). 

Digital illustration on offer. 
Resolution 3500px x 3500px in PNG format.  
Date of realization: August 01, 2022 
Made during the challenge: 100 days, 100 drawings.  
Technique: Digital drawing with my fingers. 
Software: Medibang Paint Pro.

All rights reserved by the author.

Bonus: 
This nft includes as a gift to the first collector an original print. Shipping included. You have 7 days from the moment of purchase to claim your gift.

Thank you for supporting my art!
